source: # Kurz Ako sa stať programátor, dátový analytik v Pythone? - Online kurz Python - 8 - Matplotlib, **GUI**

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot([1,2,3,4,5],[2,4,6,9,11])
plt.title("Zavislost mojho veku od penazi")
plt.xlabel("X-ova os")
plt.ylabel("Y-ova os")
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot([1,2,3,4,5],[-2,4,6,9,-11])
plt.title("Zavislost mojho veku od penazi")
plt.xlabel("X-ova os")
plt.ylabel("Y-ova os")
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
# RGB  
# CMYK
# HSV, HSB, HSL
# p - pentauholnik, x - krizik, o - gulicka, d (disc) , s - stvorec, ^ - strieska je trojuholnik(Ctrl+Alt+F4)
# -- (dot) ciarkovana, -., . , *, 
plt.plot([1,2,3,4,5],[1,4,9,16,25], "mo")
plt.title("Zavislost mojho veku od penazi")
plt.xlabel("X-ova os")
plt.ylabel("Y-ova os")
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
# RGB  
# CMYK
# HSV, HSB, HSL
plt.plot([1,2,3,4,5],[1,4,9,16,25], "bx")
plt.title("Zavislost mojho veku od penazi")
plt.xlabel("X-ova os")
plt.ylabel("Y-ova os")
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot([1,2,3,4,5],[1,4,9,16,25], "mp")
plt.title("Zavislost mojho veku od penazi")
plt.xlabel("X-ova os")
plt.ylabel("Y-ova os")
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

t = np.arange(0, 6,  0.5)
plt.plot(t, t, "mo", t, t**2, "rd", t, t**3, "gp", t, t**4, "bs", t, t**4, "o--")
plt.title("Zavislost mojho veku od penazi")
plt.xlabel("X-ova os")
plt.ylabel("Y-ova os")
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

skupiny = ["1. skupina", "2. skupina", "3. skupina", "4. skupina"]
hodnoty = [0,1,10,100]

plt.figure(figsize=(9,4))
plt.subplot(131)
plt.bar(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(132)
plt.plot(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(133)
plt.scatter(skupiny, hodnoty)



plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

skupiny = ["1. skupina", "2. skupina", "3. skupina"]
hodnoty = [1,10,100]
# default 6.4, 4.8 v inch-och
plt.figure(figsize=(11.5,3.5))
# default subplot (1,1,1)
# cislo riadku, cislo stlpca, index
# nrows, ncols, index
plt.subplot(131)
plt.bar(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(132)
plt.plot(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(133)
plt.scatter(skupiny, hodnoty)

plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

skupiny = ["1. skupina", "2. skupina", "3. skupina"]
hodnoty = [1,10,100]
# default 6.4, 4.8 v inch-och
plt.figure(figsize=(11.5,3.5))
# default subplot (1,1,1)
# cislo riadku, cislo stlpca, index
# nrows, ncols, index
plt.subplot(1,4,1)
plt.bar(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(1,4,2)
plt.plot(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(1,4,3)
plt.scatter(skupiny, hodnoty)
plt.subplot(1,4,4)
plt.plot(skupiny, hodnoty)

plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# mi - Stredna hodnota/median
# Sigma smerodajná odchýlka +-autobus
mi, sigma = 100, 20
x = mi + sigma * np.random.randn(10000)
n, bins, patches = plt.hist(x, 20, density = 1, facecolor = "m", alpha = 0.8)

plt.xlabel("IQ")
plt.ylabel("Pravdepodobnosť")
plt.title("Histogram IQ")
plt.text(25,0.015, "mi = 100")
# plt.text(50,0.015, r"$\mi\ = 100$")
plt.text(25,0.0125, "sigma = 20")
# plt.text(50,0.0125, r"$\sigma\ = 20$")
plt.grid()
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# mi - Stredna hodnota/median
# Sigma smerodajná odchýlka +-autobus
mi, sigma = 100, 20
x = mi + sigma * np.random.randn(10000)
n, bins, patches = plt.hist(x, 20, density = 1, facecolor = "m", alpha = 0.8)

plt.xlabel("IQ")
plt.ylabel("Pravdepodobnosť")
plt.title("Histogram IQ")
# plt.text(25,0.015, "mi = 100")
plt.text(50,0.015, r"$\mu\ = 100$")
# plt.text(25,0.0125, "sigma = 20")
plt.text(50,0.0125, r"$\sigma\ = 20$")
plt.grid()
plt.show()

!pip install tkinter

import tkinter 

canvas = tkinter.Canvas()
canvas.pack()
canvas.create_text(120, 140, text = "Hello World")
tkinter.mainloop()
